title: Silver player looking to form a team
body: I'm looking to put together a group of people who want to play in a team. So far I have three mid-silvers, a jungle main, a support main, and one who can play mid or top. We'll take people who play anything, though. We're serious about playing to win but we're a bit older than average and really not into any kind of bm or nasty in-game behaviour, we want to see if we can find some group synergy and have fun. Add BranindainHH if you're interested, if you're a team player you will be welcome regardless of rank.

replies.body:
hey man id love to join I main mid but good with all roles and  other then adc 

ahri, akili, anivia, ekko(learning atm), fizz, kat, kayle, sona, soraka and zed


I too am looking for a dedicated team of mature people to lean from  get better and climb with thanks 
summoner name :HAppY101

I am a support main silver 4

Janna, Lulu, Alistar, Zilean, Leona, Shen, Annie and Sona
I ll join man i can lenoa sup, hemi mid or top or zilean or blitz

Hey, 
I am a jungle main and I play and learn whatever is currently the strongest so I play a large variety of champs, but jungle is taken, which then leaves me to support, but again that is also taken. I used to main ADC so i know what I'm doing their, but not as good as I used to be. I can play pretty much play anywhere except my pool will be limited for mid and top, but I am willing to learn champs for those roles if needed.

I'm really looking for a dedicated team of mature people to learn, get better, climb together and to make some new friends.
I am currently 17 years old.
Silver V at the moment but was Silver 1 S4.
I am available 5 days a week. The days I am not available is Tuesday, Thursday and Sunday (Depending on playing times, I may be able to make those days).
IGN: Fujimotokureno

Thanks. Fuji
Hey what time zone are you in (NZ, Sydney, Perth)?
